channel.title: I dont understand how this works... [PI]
channel.description:
So on my PI, i found this spawning code im going to use for my upcoming skill, but i dont understand the spawning command, can someone help me? [code]spawnNpc(Client c, int npcType, int x, int y, int heightLevel, int WalkingType, int HP, int maxHit, int attack, int defence, boolean attackPlayer, boolean headIcon)[/code]
I understand it all, except the "Client c" "attackPlayer" and "boolean headIcon" can someone explain those to me and how they work?
Thanks in adavnce

item.title: I dont understand how this works... [PI]
item.dc:creator: @n10si_t n10si t
item.description:
@n10si_t wrote:

[quote=“mrperson, post:9, topic:385879”][code]package server.model.minigames;

import server.model.players.Client;
import server.Server;
import server.model.minigames.RFD;
import server.model.npcs.NPCHandler;

public class nameblocked {
public void spawnnpcs() {

public static void createNPC(int npcType, int x, int y) {
int slot = server.model.npcs.NPCHandler.newNPC(npcType, x, y, 0, 0, 0, 0, true, false);
nameblocked:D;
}
}

}[/code][/quote]

Can’t put voids inside voids broski.

This is how it should look:

[code]package server.model.minigames;

import server.model.players.Client;
import server.Server;
import server.model.minigames.RFD;
import server.model.npcs.NPCHandler;

public class nameblocked {

public static void createNPC(int npcType, int x, int y) {
int slot = server.model.npcs.NPCHandler.newNPC(npcType, x, y, 0, 0, 0, 0, true, false);
nameblocked;
}

}
[/code]

Read full topic

[code]package server.model.minigames;

import server.model.players.Client;

import server.model.npcs.NPCHandler;

public class nameblocked {
public void spawnnpcs() {

public static void createNPC(int npcType, int x, int y) {
int slot = server.model.npcs.NPCHandler.newNPC(npcType, x, y, 0, 0, 0, 0, true, false);
nameblocked:D;
}
}

}[/code]

that doesnt work either :o

One sec, let me try declaring a void within the same file for making npcs.

Hmm, doesnt work either…
[/quote]

Post the error you’re getting.[/quote]

K

This is the error i get when i try to declare a new way of spawning npcs (void method) in the file im trying to spawn npcs in.

And heres the method

public static void createNPC(int npcType, int x, int y) { int slot = server.model.npcs.NPCHandler.newNPC(npcType, x, y, 0, 0, 0, 0, true, false); nameblocked:P; }

spawnNpc(c, 1, 3200, 3201, 0, 1, 7, 2, 1, 1, true, false);

item.title: I dont understand how this works... [PI]
item.dc:creator: @n10si_t n10si t
item.description:
@n10si_t wrote:

Example, a man:

c.spawnNpc(1, 3200, 3201, 0, 1, 7, 2, 1, 1, true, false);

Client c is just the “c.” in front of spawnNpc (I think, I may be wrong here)

attackPlayer is just if players can attack this npc

headicon is if the npc has a headicon and/or it will give the player a headicon

Read full topic
